sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Footer() { return (
{/* Footer illustration */}
{/* Top area: Blocks */}
{/* 1st block */}
{/* Logo */}
{/* 2nd, 3rd, 4th and 5th blocks */}
{/* 2nd block */}
Products

  • Visual Studio X
  • Easy Content

Resources
  • Industries and tools
  • Use cases
  • Blog
  • Online events

  • Open-source

© 2020 Appy. All rights reserved.
); } export default Footer;
